SUBCLASS Sonic UBC: Laptop Sounds and Sensors. A digital performance ensemble using accelerometers, MIDI controllers, web cams, tablets, etc. for concerts/installations. Each member participates in studio and public performances each semester, gives technical presentations, and assists other members. Course pre-requisite: MUSC 320. Please contact instructor for permission to register. Class meets in ICICS Building, Room X704.
description: Collaborative projects developing new connections between sound and gestures in live concert performance or responsive environments using multiple digital technologies. May be repeated once for credit.
